backpack: The central focus of the write‑up, referring to methods that enable AI systems to align with human values without extensive manual supervision.
A common algorithmic approach for aligning language models that is likely discussed as a baseline or component of the bootcamp curriculum.
The broader field within which auto‑alignment research resides, emphasizing the prevention of harmful AI behavior.

Describes an intensive, structured training program or curriculum used to teach and evaluate auto‑alignment methods.. Context from paper: Auto-alignment bootcamp write-up 
This is a summary of auto-alignment thinking so far by Marie, Jacob & Marshall
Key component in many alignment pipelines, used to infer human preferences from data and guide model behavior.
A theoretical alignment technique that may be covered as part of advanced bootcamp material for scaling oversight.
Techniques that allow models to improve alignment using internal signals rather than explicit external labels.
Methods such as activation‑patching or feature attribution likely employed in the bootcamp to diagnose alignment failures.

The critic agent is specialized for critique tasks by further training (fine‑tuning) a base research model on labeled flaw‑identification data.. Context from paper: The critic is the lab’s top research agent (for which we have a no-scheming safety case), specialized (through finetuning) on the task of critique, and maybe also specialized on the research field of the paper being critiqued (although this is more expensive) The main way these signals are used is by finetuning the critic
Different instances of the critic are prompted with varied subsets of logs, instructions, or failure‑mode focuses to generate a broad set of candidate flaws.

concept: Bayesian probability assessment of flaw severity
backpack: A Bayesian component can output a calibrated probability that a piece of work is severely flawed, even when computational resources are limited.
anchor_exact: Bayesian probability assessment of flaw severity
anchor_alias: Bayesian probability assessment of flaw severity

backpack: The agent dynamically decides which possible flaws to investigate further by applying logical deduction from basic scientific principles.

concept: knowledge‑base retrieval of past similar mistakes
backpack: During investigation the critic consults a database of previously observed methodological errors to inform forecasting and prioritization.
anchor_exact: knowledge‑base retrieval of past similar mistakes
anchor_alias: knowledge‑base retrieval of past similar mistakes

backpack: The top‑level research agent is wrapped in a formally verified safety case that guarantees the model will not develop instrumental convergence or scheming behaviors.
